item.title: A Clean Break (Let's Work)
item.description: |:E |C |B :| E C B E Just beginning to take that love away E C B E Just beginning to take that love away E C D G C B E C B E In a minute I’ll wash that love away E C B E Even now we remember what we used to say E C B E Takes a minute to wash that love away E C D G C B E C B E Take a clean break: wash that love away
